FuncDef: This command updates the data of the SLAAC host information.
CLIs: edit-slaac-host sap <sap-id> [ user-name <user-name> ] [ mac <mac-address> ] [ session-id <session-id> ] [ ip-address <ip-address> ] [ subscriber <sub-ident-string> ] [ sub-profile-string <sub-profile-string> ] [ sla-profile-string <sla-profile-string> ] [ inter-dest-id <intermediate-destination-id> ] [ ancp-string <ancp-string> ] [ app-profile-string <app-profile-string> ]

edit-slaac-host svc-id <service-id> [ user-name <user-name> ] [ mac <mac-address> ] [ session-id <session-id> ] [ ip-address <ip-address> ] [ subscriber <sub-ident-string> ] [ sub-profile-string <sub-profile-string> ] [ sla-profile-string <sla-profile-string> ] [ inter-dest-id <intermediate-destination-id> ] [ ancp-string <ancp-string> ] [ app-profile-string <app-profile-string> ]

ParaDef.Info: Specifies a SAP ID, up to 255 characters maximum.
Specifies the PPP user name up to 253 characters.
Specifies the 48-bit MAC address for the static ARP in the form aa:bb:cc:dd:ee:ff or aa-bb-cc-dd-ee-ff where aa, bb, cc, dd, ee, and ff are hexadecimal numbers.
Specifies information about the ID of the PPP session. Values-1 to 65535.
Specifies an existing subscriber identification profile.
Identifies the SLA profile string up to 16 characters.
Specifies the peer s IP address.
Specifies an existing subscriber service ID. Values-1 to 2147483647.
Specifies the subscriber profile string up to 16 characters.
Specifies the subscriber profile name up to 32 characters.
Specifies the intermediate destination identifier which is encoded in the identification strings up to 32 characters.
Specifies the ASCII representation of the up to 63 characters.
Specifies the application profile string up to 16 characters.
